price: 47. Ibrâhîm alobi: Kimia ezala nayo, nakosengelaka yo na Allah alimbisa yo, mpo ye andimelaka ngai тропа bolamu.
arabic: قَالَ سَلَٰمٌ عَلَيۡكَۖ سَأَسۡتَغۡفِرُ لَكَ رَبِّيٓۖ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ بِي حَفِيّٗا

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.
